bibl.title: Some Byzantine Papyri from the Amsterdam Papyrus Collection.
bibl.note: Y sont jointes 4 pll. se rapportant Ã : Idem, Letters on Ostraka., Talanta 1973. - 1. P. Amst. Inv. 103. Deed of divorce. Provenance unknown, VIth cent. - 2. Inv. 43. Receipt. Provenance unknown, VIth cent. Appendix: P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 19941. Instruction of payment. Provenance unknown, VIIth cent. - 3. P. Amst. Inv. 46. Survey of paid wine. Provenance unknown, VIth cent. - 4. Inv. 17. End of a document. List of payments (?). Provenance unknown (Oxyrhynchite nome?), 22.12.303 [corriger en 20.12.303]. - 5. Inv. 47. Receipt. Survey of paid artabae of wheat. Provenance unknown, Vth/VIth cent. - 6. Inv. 102. Land-lease. Hermupolis, VIth/VIIth cent. Appendix: P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 26267 (= S.B. VI, 9292). - Idem 25674 (= S.B. VI, 9295). - Idem 14045. Land-lease. Hermupolis, 498. - Idem 25948. Idem. Idem, 571. - Idem 20681. Idem. Idem, VIIth cent. - Idem 325. Idem. Idem, VIIth cent. - 7. P. Amst. Inv. 49. Survey of paid artabae of barley and wheat. Provenance unknown, Vth/VIth cent.
Sijpesteijn P.J., Some Byzantine Papyri from the Amsterdam Papyrus Collection.
